comment: Bio lo née gurinchi rayali ra Mahesh babu gurinchi kadhu...Aina introverts gurinchi vinadame kaani experience chese adhrustam aithe née valle vachindhi ra...The biggest introvert I have ever seen in my life...
name: Bhavana Devi

comment: Online lo ninnu chusi chaala extrovert anukunna kaani first time kalisinapudu telisindi nuvvu chaala introvert ani.. Pakkane vuntav kaani kalavataaniki kuda kudaradhu atleast inka nunchi ayina appudapudu kalavataaniki try cheyi.. Had great time with you yaar ( Mainly those last days of college)
name: Kothuru Sharvani
